trans:
Take the flour in a mixing bowl. Create a space in the center of the flour, add yeast, granulated sugar, warm milk and wait for the yeast to activate (about 5 minutes). Add the necessary ingredients except the butter (including the slurry). Knead the dough until it is smooth. Finally, add the butter and knead it for the last time (the consistency of your dough may vary depending on the quality, it will be a medium hard dough). Let the dough rise, and after the rising time, deflate it and roll it out into a square shape of 30*30 cm (I measured it for youğŸ¥°ğŸ˜€). Spread your oil with garlic sauce on the dough. Add grated cheese on it and divide it into 16 equal pieces. Put them on top of each other and put them in a baking dish. Leave it to rise (average 30 minutes). At the end of the time, spray the dough with water. Add kasseri cheese in between the layers, bake in the lowest level of an unpreheated 180 degree fan oven until the top is completely browned. Done. ğŸ™‚â†”ï¸
Sincerely, it is the best yeasted pastry I have eaten recently. Garlic gave a very good flavor and there is no dominant smell. Try it. ğŸ˜‹
Good luck to those who will try, bon appetit. See you, I'm gone. ğŸ™‹ğŸ»â™€ï¸ğŸ¤—
